channel.title: Anoucment for all accounts that have a perm banned(good news)
channel.description: i just found out today i went to the appeal thing today at rs and it said i had last chance appeals. I am pretty sure its for all accounts that were banned before july 6th cuz a few of my accounts that were banned before that have this last chance appeal, they are still pending i thought every person would like this especially macroers , mules, main, and account from the duping a few years ago. i hope this helps all i'll let you know what accounts got unbanned and ill post the appeals that get accepted (if any do) to let you know what works for appeals and what dont

IT WORKED!!!
YEYEYSHS

TIME TO HAPPY SPAM
LHW RTGOSEHGVBBFRFBVDNXBFGTFHNB
thank you to all, but you don’t know how happy i am

item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Those dumb-ass Jagex faggots. I appealed my pure acc and waited about 3 months then I got answered by the shit auto response. Then I was thinking that will I get my other account back (it got perm ban when there wasn’t even Rs2, like on 2001) if I curse at them. After a week It got answered! BY THE AUTO RESPONSE!!! ARGH…

item.title: Anoucment for all accounts that have a perm banned(good news)
item.dc:creator: @swordslaser9 swordslaser9
item.description:
@swordslaser9 wrote:

If they declined ur 1st appeal the will prob deny the rest. ive done last change apeal 14 times on diffrent accoutn and none of them where applead… they say they over veweed ur acc and check ur impact and thinking tworad the game and then they will declien it. they said this…

We have reviewed your account, and have decided to not grant your appeal. You have continued to break our rules, time and time again, and due to the severity of these offences as well as your attitude within RuneScape, we have decided that your account will remain permanently banned.

Any messages sent regarding this account will be ignored, and we ask that you re-read all of the rules if you wish to create another account.

RuneScape Customer Support

lol they suck they dont even read it… i played 1 yeer on that acc. well i did play 4 yeers on my main lol…mabey thats y my appeals when quicker and got accepted.

Read full topic

item.title: Anoucment for all accounts that have a perm banned(good news)
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

Reason for appeal supplied at time of appeal:
Dear jagex

can you please unban my account. i am trully considering succide if you dont
unban my account. When i do commit succide i will leave a note in my pocket
that says andrew gower the owner of runescape drove me to kill myself, so the
y will find it when searching my body. then you guys will get charged with as
isted succide which could put you in jail.i will kill myself
Explanation of why appeal was accepted:

We have reviewed your account, and have decided to grant you a Last Chance. However should you break any of the rules then your account will be permanently banned, with no further chance for appeal. We strongly suggest going over our rules to make sure you do not break them in the future and also recommend changing your behaviour within RuneScape as even a small offence may result in your account being permanently banned.

We hope you will not take this chance for granted and we hope that you can continue to enjoy the world of RuneScape.

RuneScape Customer Support

FUK YA!!!

i havent had that account since 2 years back!!!1111111

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“Cabby, post:24, topic:39964”]Here is mine…

[quote]You have apologised for this offence and said the offence will not occur again.

Whilst we encourage such apologies, we are afraid that the offence still stands.
[/quote]
I don’t remember what I said though

And I think its funny that you can view the evidence, but yet they have none…
How stupid can JaGeX be?[/quote]

Well, until recently, you could try to log into a random account as many times as you wanted with an incorrect password.

item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:18, topic:39964”]its been their sense December first, i filled one out and got this reply back:

Appeal Date: 1 December 2006 Close Date: 17 January 2007

We have reviewed your account, and have decided to not grant your appeal. You have continued to break our rules, time and time again, and due to the severity of these offences as well as your attitude within RuneScape, we have decided that your account will remain permanently banned.

Any messages sent regarding this account will be ignored, and we ask that you re-read all of the rules if you wish to create another account.

RuneScape Customer Support

i didn’t realise autoing wa sooooo horrid :p[/quote]

lol so some are automated? Since i got the same message.

Read full topic

item.title: Anoucment for all accounts that have a perm banned(good news)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Dear hampton120,

Thank you for your request for a last chance.
Unfortunately, we have decided not to grant you a last chance.
Nonetheless, this is no reason to talk about suicide. Remember, RuneScape is just a game and there are so many other reasons that make life worth living.
Anyway, please refrain from swearing at us in the future and consider others in the game, then you will never get banned a different account, which you are invited to start right now.

Kind regards,

Mod_Fetzki

How cute. Looks like they’re doing last chance appeals by hand now.

Read full topic
